description.value: The first time in a combat encounter the Sister inflicts Righteous Fury upon the enemy, they regain 1 spent Fate Point.

system.benefit: The first time in a combat encounter the Sister inflicts Righteous Fury upon the enemy, they regain 1 spent Fate Point.

prerequisites.text: Tier 2: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Cleanse with Fire, Ballistic Skill 45.
